markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Upkeep Phase](/Rules.aspx?ID=1795)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 537</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
During the Upkeep phase, you adjust your kingdom's statistics based on activities you have taken during the previous month. Remember that you earn 1 Fame or Infamy point at the start of your turn.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<document level="2" id="rules-1796" />

<document level="2" id="rules-1797" />

<document level="2" id="rules-1798" />

<document level="2" id="rules-1799" />
name: Upkeep Phase

text: Upkeep Phase Source Kingmaker Adventure Path pg. 537 During the Upkeep phase, you adjust your kingdom's statistics based on activities you have taken during the previous month. Remember that you earn 1 Fame or Infamy point at the start of your turn.
